sentence.Network_en: The black reticule sagged under the weight of shapeless objects.
sentence.Network_cn: 黑色的拎包由于装了各种形状的东西而中间下陷.

sentence.Network_en: The paper gives a method for designing a new kind of liquid crystal reticule.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French réticule, from Latin reticulum (see reticulum)

means.word_mean: 1. a woman's drawstring handbag; usually made of net or beading or brocade; used in 18th and 19th centuries
2. a network of fine lines, dots, cross hairs, or wires in the focal plane of the eyepiece of an optical instrument
